column1: NVT - PNR just announced its upcoming divided. You can't simply do nothing. PNR cut its dividend from .35 to .175. Again, you can't just be quiet and say nothing one way or another. Lots of people own your stock and they are wondering what will happen to the dividend (PNR to PNR and NVT) - is there going to be one? If it is less than .1/share for NVT - there will be a riot.
NVT reached an all time low at 14.16

In my opinion, this is all Nelson Peltz and the Trian hedge funds fault. These 2 companies(PNR,NVT) are poison!!! Stay away, if you know what is good for you. Just look at GE and Proctor and Gamble!!! Correct me if I am wrong.
NVT reached an all time low at $21.01
NVT reached an all time low at 18.84
NVT reached a new All Time High at 29.22
NVT Purchase of 365,000 shares at $26.96 per share by Director Baldwin Brian M on 05/31

PNR Just cut its dividend from .35 to .175. What will NVT do? Where did the $3.1 B go that that PNR got last fall? What a JOKE. Does anyone think that NVT will have a Dividend at all? I just got killed by this spin off. I live off the Dividends. Randy - why did you not take the DEAL to sell NVT. It would have been far better than this mess and waste. Again, what a JOKE! Randy everything you touched turned to dung - Transrack, Web, Enclosures East, Enclosures West - should I go on. Tyco etc. Next time I see you, be prepared. I am not going to be silent just because were around family.
NVT reached an all time low at 19.39
NVT reached a new All Time High at 28.16
Where is the call on the Dividend? Yes - How Much. No, Why?
NVT reached a new All Time High at 27.37
NVT reached an all time low at 16.25

Dividend? They can't stay silent. If nothing, a riot among the ranks. PNR cut theirs in half while they spun off 1/3 of the company. They are getting killed on this. NVT your next if you do not have a least a .05/share dividend.
NVT reached a new All Time High at 28.50

Look for nVent to be acquired in the next 6 months. They make too much money for someone not to want them. Rockwell, ABB, ITW, Schneider, LaGrand and others are researching soon will make bids to buy. Stock will soar to $50 or so in the bididng. nVent is too small to stay by itself and this is a great payoff for all. Buy now and sell in 6 months.
NVT reached a new All Time High at 26.63
NVT reached an all time low at 15.69
